means: 不笑的，面无笑容的，严肃的

sentence.Network_en: His eyes were hard and unsmiling.
Mrs rumbold was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress.
sentence.Network_cn: 兰姆伯尔德夫人是一位身材高大而且不爱笑的女人, 穿着紧身黑色衣裙.

新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... inform vt. 告诉，通知，报告 unsmiling a. 板着脸，不笑的 inland ad. 向内地，在内地.

in the end , between those unsmiling chinese security men guarding the flame and the impassioned protesters in paris , london and san francisco , the global relay has still made a symbolic point , although clearly not the one beijing intended .归根结底，夹在表情严肃

list.abs: The boss an unsmiling man ., 老板是个不苟言笑的人.
without smiling ; in an unsmiling manner .没有笑；以不笑的方式。

entry.def: An unsmiling person is not smiling, and looks serious or unfriendly.

example.ex: ...the unsmiling woman in the ticket booth.
example.tran: 售票亭里板着脸的女人
